name: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire - Classic Puzzle Game
name_original: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire - Classic Puzzle Game
description:
Mahjong Solitaire is a solitaire matching game that uses a set of mahjong tiles rather than cards. The goal is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play.

MahJong features:
- 4 themes(spring,summer,autumn,winter)
- hint, undo and shuffle options
- 200+ layouts
- HD graphics
- Game with no time limits
- Every layout winnable
